name: Metamothosis
description:
Pesky adventurers have stopped your latest attempt at world domination and turned you into a fluffy moth. Luckily, you already prepared a recipe for a cure. But brewing it while stuck in such a peculiar shape will prove challenging, even for an evil mastermind such as you.

How to play

Find the ingredients listed in the recipe book and throw them into the cauldron in the given order.
Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Camera
Space -  Flap Wings (use often)
E - Grab/Release Object
LMB - Menu: Select Menu Options
LMB - Game: Grab/Release Object
ESC - Pause
K - Reset (to Main Menu)

Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
